reference_outputs.title: Add /health endpoint
reference_outputs.description:
This PR adds a simple health-check endpoint to the API. The FastAPI app now includes a router that exposes a GET /health route returning a status payload. Tests: Not shown in diff.

**Key Changes:**

- Added a new routes module defining an APIRouter.
- Implemented GET /health returning `{ "status": "ok" }`.
- Tests: Not shown in diff.

reference_outputs.title: Handle empty/invalid numeric input
reference_outputs.description:
This PR hardens numeric parsing by trimming input and returning null for empty or invalid values. Callers are updated to handle the nullable result and fall back when needed. Tests: Not shown in diff.

**Key Changes:**
- Updated `parseNumber` to trim input before parsing.
- Made `parseNumber` return `null` for empty strings and NaN results.
- Adjusted `parseQuantity` to fall back to `0` when parsing returns null.
- Tests: Not shown in diff.
reference_outputs.commit_message: fix: make parseNumber return null for invalid input

reference_outputs.title: Fix email regex to accept % and +
reference_outputs.description:
This PR updates the email validation regex to accept additional characters in the local-part. Specifically, the character class is expanded to include `%` and `+` while keeping the existing validation approach. Ticket: ABC-123.

**Key Changes:**
- Updated `EMAIL_REGEX` to include `%` and `+` in the allowed local-part characters.
- Kept the regex case-insensitive flag (`/i`) unchanged.
- Continued using `EMAIL_REGEX.test(email)` in `isValidEmail`.
- Tests: Not shown in diff.
reference_outputs.commit_message: (ABC-123) fix: allow % and + in email regex

reference_outputs.title: Treat timezone-less timestamps as UTC in toUtcIso
reference_outputs.description:
This PR fixes UTC conversion for timestamps that omit an explicit timezone suffix. Inputs without a trailing `Z` or numeric offset are now treated as UTC instead of local time by normalizing the string before parsing. Unit tests were updated to cover the new behavior.

**Key Changes:**
- Trimmed `input` before processing and returned `null` for empty strings.
- Detected whether the timestamp already includes a timezone (`Z`/`z` or `Â±HH:MM`).
- Appended `Z` for timezone-less timestamps prior to `Date` parsing.
- Updated unit tests to verify timezone-less inputs normalize to UTC.
